categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Grigor was a male Humanoid who served as a Lord of the resurgent Sith Empire during the Galactic War.

In 3640 BBY, Lord Grigor was among the Sith forces who, under the command of Dark Councilors Darth Hadra and Darth Acharon, was holding off the Republic push on the Legislature Building of Corellia. During the attack he was killed by a Republic spacer.
